text: mariyu vastavanga, memu modati sari mim'malni puttincinatle, mirippudu ma vaddaku ontariga vaccaru. Mariyu memu iccinadanta, miru mi vipula venuka vadali vaccaru. Mariyu miru allah ku satiga (bhagasvamuluga) kalpincina mi sipharasudarulanu, memu mito patu cudatam lede! Vastavanga ippudu mi madhya unna sambandhalanni tegi poyayi mariyu mi bhramalanni mim'malni tyajincayi
